summary: Fixes the perks Conditioned and Unhindered to have effects from both mods.
descriptionHtml:
Please endorse Shadow Play and ACE - Combat Skills if you like this patch. 
----

This plugin resolves the conflicts between ACE Armor (AA) and Shadow Play (SP).
The issues resolved by this mod are the incompatible armor perks Unhindered from
the light armor tree and the Conditioned perk fom the Heavy armor tree.

This patch works with:
 - ACE Armor 12a 
 - Shadow Play 1.1

changes: 

Unhindered perk now grant both the stamina regeneration bonus from ACE and the
carryweight bonus and movement speed bonus from SP. The movement speed bonus is
reduced to 2.5 percent from the original five percent. Carry weight bonus
is decreased to 35 points from 75. The movement speed bonus occurs only when 
wearing 3 or more pieces of light armor.

Conditioned perk from SP broke the Strong Back and Defelct Criticals 
perks of ACE. The 150 bonus to carryweight from SP has been removed and \'merged\'
with the Strong Back perk. An additional 50 carry weight is granted when three
or more pieces of heavy armor are worn. A movement speed bonus of 3% has been 
added, also when three pieces of heavy armor are worn. 

- - - 

These choices reflect my personal preferences and not those of the original mod
authors\'. I have made this patch because the author of SP has not updated the
mod since May 2012. 

Load order that works for me:

ACE Armor.esp
ShadowPlay.esp
ACE Armor - Shadow Play - compromise.esp

You may manually edit the loadorder.txt file in:
C:\\Users\\jaroslav\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim

or use two \'User Rules\' in BOSS:

sort \"ShadowPlay.esp\" after \"ACE Armor.esp\"
sort \"ACE Armor - Shadow Play - compromise.esp\" after \"ShadowPlay.esp\"
